statements: UPDATE communication_logs SET sender='Alice', receiver='Bob', message='Hello Bob', timestamp='2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE log_id=1;
UPDATE communication_logs SET receiver='Alice', message='Hi Alice!', timestamp='2022-01-02 15:30:00', sender='Bob' WHERE log_id=2;
UPDATE communication_logs SET sender = 'Alice', receiver = 'Bob', message = 'Hello, Bob!', timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:30:00' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE communication_logs SET timestamp = '2022-02-15 15:45:00', message = 'Update: Meeting rescheduled', receiver = 'Alice', sender = 'Smith' WHERE log_id = 2;
UPDATE communication_logs SET astronaut_message = 'Received new instructions' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE astronauts SET mission_count = mission_count + 1 WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
UPDATE communication_logs SET astronaut_message = 'Received updated instructions from mission control' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE astronauts SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', mission_count = 4 WHERE astronaut_id = 2;
UPDATE communication_logs SET message='Updated message content' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE astronauts SET role='Engineer' WHERE astronaut_id = 2;
UPDATE communication_logs SET message='Updated message for log_id 1' WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE astronauts SET role='Engineer' WHERE astronaut_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE missions SET start_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE mission_id = 1;
UPDATE astronauts SET age = 40, nationality = 'American' WHERE astronaut_id = 2;
UPDATE missions SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE mission_id = 1;
UPDATE astronauts SET nationality = 'American', age = 35 WHERE astronaut_id = 3;
UPDATE MissionControlCommunicationLogs SET message = 'Communication logs updated' WHERE log_id = 12345;
UPDATE Astronauts SET age = 35, nationality = 'USA' WHERE astronaut_id = 67890;
UPDATE MissionControlCommunicationLogs SET message = 'Mission aborted due to weather conditions' WHERE mission_id = 5 AND astronaut_id = 3;
UPDATE AstronautTraining SET training_duration = 10, training_type = 'Advanced Survival' WHERE astronaut_id = 2 AND training_id = 7;
